text:
="preserve">Clive Bright (stage name: Tenor Saw; December 6, 1966 – August 1988) was an important reggae musician in the 1980s. He had several hit songs. His best-known one was "Ring the Alarm" in 1985.
In August 1988, Tenor Saw was killed during a hit and run accident in Houston, Texas. He was 21.
